mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM oem_voucher_batch_select_trigger_mapping m INNER JOIN oem_voucher_select_grant_trigger t ON m.fk_select_grant_id = t.id WHERE t.deleted = #{deleted} AND m.fk_batch_id = #{batchId}

SELECT m.fk_batch_id as batchId, t.id as grantTypeId, 4 as grantType, t.grant_limit_per_time as grantLimitPerTime, 0 as grantTimesLimit FROM oem_voucher_batch_select_trigger_mapping m INNER JOIN oem_voucher_select_grant_trigger t ON m.fk_select_grant_id = t.id WHERE t.deleted = 0 and t.active = 1 AND m.fk_batch_id = #{batchId}

SELECT t.id as grantTypeId, 4 as grantType, t.grant_limit_per_time AS grantLimitPerTime, null AS grantTimesLimit, b.id as batchId, b.voucher_template_id AS generateId, DATE_FORMAT(b.redeem_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.redeem_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime, b.business_type AS businessType, b.business_type_option as businessTypeOption, b.expiry_date_type AS expiryDateType, b.valid_for_number_of_days AS validForNumberOfDays, b.voucher_name AS voucherName, b.redeem_value AS redeemValue, b.usage_rule AS usageRule, b.voucher_type AS voucherType, b.minimum_spend_amount AS minimumSpendAmount FROM oem_voucher_select_grant_trigger t LEFT JOIN oem_select_grant_car_number_mapping n ON t.id = n.fk_select_grant_id LEFT JOIN oem_select_grant_car_make_mapping m ON t.id = m.fk_select_grant_id LEFT JOIN oem_voucher_batch_select_trigger_mapping s ON t.id = s.fk_select_grant_id LEFT JOIN oem_voucher_batch_select_trigger_mapping tm ON t.id=tm.fk_select_grant_id LEFT JOIN voucher_batch b ON tm.fk_batch_id=b.id
b.`status`= #{status} and t.vehicle_binding_status = #{bindingStatus} AND (m.make_name is null or m.make_name = #{c.seriesName}) AND (n.car_number is null or n.car_number = #{c.simpleVehicleNumber}) AND (t.vehicle_sale_start_date is null or t.vehicle_sale_start_date <= #{c.saleDate}) AND (t.vehicle_sale_end_date is null or t.vehicle_sale_end_date >= #{c.saleDate}) AND (t.last_back_to_dealer_start_time is null or t.last_back_to_dealer_start_time <= #{c.lastBackStoreTime}) AND (t.last_back_dealer_end_time is null or t.last_back_dealer_end_time >= #{c.lastBackStoreTime}) AND (t.last_back_dealer_mileage_min is null or t.last_back_dealer_mileage_min <= #{c.lastBackStoreMileage}) AND (t.last_back_dealer_mileage_max is null or t.last_back_dealer_mileage_max >= #{c.lastBackStoreMileage})
group by b.id
